竹笛: (たけぶえ) - flute constructed of bamboo
竹箆: (しっぺ) - bamboo stick used to strike meditators into greater wakefulness (in Zen Buddhism); (esp. しっぺ) striking someone's wrist with one's index and middle finger
竹箆返し: (しっぺいがえし) - returning tit for tat; retaliating
竹節人参: (ちくせつにんじん) - Japanese ginseng (Panax japonicus)
竹節虫: (ナナフシ) - walking stick (any insect of order Phasmatodea); walkingstick; stick insect; leaf insect
竹篦: (しっぺ) - bamboo stick used to strike meditators into greater wakefulness (in Zen Buddhism); (esp. しっぺ) striking someone's wrist with one's index and middle finger
竹篦返し: (しっぺがえし) - returning tit for tat; retaliating
竹籤: (たけひご) - thin strip of bamboo
竹糖: (たけとう) - Chinese sugarcane (Saccharum sinense) (used for making wasanbon)
竹縁: (たけえん) - veranda with bamboo flooring
竹蜻蛉: (たけとんぼ) - small wooden Japanese toy that flies when spun between the palms of one's hands
竹輪麩: (ちくわぶ) - flour paste cake in the form of a tube
竹馬の友: (ちくばのとも) - childhood friend; old playmate
竹麦魚: (ホウボウ) - red gurnard (Chelidonichthys spinosus); gurnet; sea robin
竺学: (じくがく) - Indian studies; Buddhist studies
竿: (かん) - Pole , rod, pole; neck (de um shamisen, etc.), shamisen; beam (i.e. the crossbar of a balance); single line (esp. as a flying formation for geese)
竿立ち: (さおだち) - bolting upright; rearing up (horse)
竿頭: (かんとう) - top of a pole
笄ぐる: (こうがいぐる) - type of Japanese woman's hairstyle using a hairpin (Edo period)
笄髷: (こうがいわげ) - type of Japanese woman's hairstyle using a hairpin (Edo period)
笈: (きゅう) - Estante de mochila, caixa de madeira carregada nas costas para guardar itens para uma peregrinação
笈摺: (おいずる) - thin, sleeveless overgarment worn by pilgrims
笊: (そう) - Cesto de bambu, cesto escorredor (tradicionalmente feito de bambu), escorredor, coador, peneira; algo cheio de furos; pessoa que bebe muito, alguém que consegue beber como um peixe
笊法: (ざるほう) - law full of loopholes; toothless law
笊貝科: (ざるがいか) - Cardiidae; family of bivalve molluscs comprising the cockles
笏: (こつ) - Mace , shaku (bastão plano de madeira ou marfim carregado na mão direita quando em trajes cerimoniais imperiais ou xintoístas)
笏拍子: (さくほうし) - clapper (two long pieces of wood that are clapped together; used in gagaku, etc.)
笑い: (warai) - laugh, laughter; smile , laugh, laughter; smile; sneer; sex aids (por exemplo, dildos, livros pornográficos, gravuras eróticas em xilogravura, etc.)
笑いかける: (わらいかける) - to smile (at); to grin (at)
笑いこける: (わらいこける) - to laugh heartily
笑いのつぼ: (わらいのつぼ) - sense of humour (humor); funny bone
笑いのツボ: (わらいのツボ) - sense of humour (humor); funny bone
笑いの渦: (わらいのうず) - clamor of laughter
笑いもの: (わらいもの) - laughingstock; butt of ridicule
笑いを取る: (わらいをとる) - to get a laugh
笑い上戸: (わらいじょうご) - merry drinker; one who laughs easily
笑い仏: (わらいほとけ) - smiling Buddha (statue); laughing Buddha
笑い倒ける: (わらいこける) - to laugh heartily
笑い出す: (わらいだす) - to burst into laughter
笑い川蝉: (ワライカワセミ) - laughing kookaburra (Dacelo novaeguineae)
笑い掛ける: (わらいかける) - to smile (at); to grin (at)
笑い物: (わらいもの) - laughingstock; butt of ridicule
笑い絵: (わらいえ) - comic or pornographic picture
笑い翡翠: (ワライカワセミ) - laughing kookaburra (Dacelo novaeguineae)
笑い者: (わらいもの) - laughingstock; butt of ridicule
笑い茸: (ワライダケ) - Panaeolus papilionaceus (species of poisonous mushroom)
笑い蕈: (ワライダケ) - Panaeolus papilionaceus (species of poisonous mushroom)
笑い転ける: (わらいこける) - to laugh heartily
笑い転げる: (わらいころげる) - to roll about with laughter; to be convulsed with laughter
笑い飛ばす: (わらいとばす) - to laugh away; to laugh off
笑い鴎: (ワライカモメ) - laughing gull (larus atricilla)
笑う: (わらう) - to laugh; to smile; (esp. 嗤う) to sneer/to ridicule; (as 笑ってしまう or 笑っちゃう) to be dumbfounded/to be flabbergasted
笑う門には福来る: (わらうかどにはふくきたる) - (proverb) (from Chi: 打開笑門福自來) laugh and grow fat; good fortune and happiness will come to the home of those who smile
笑える: (わらえる) - to be made to laugh
笑みをたたえる: (えみをたたえる) - to be all smiles
笑みを湛える: (えみをたたえる) - to be all smiles
笑仏: (わらいほとけ) - smiling Buddha (statue); laughing Buddha
笑壺の会: (えつぼのかい) - gathering that's fun for everyone present
笑止: (しょうし) - laughable; ridiculous; pitiful; contemptible; absurdity
笑止千万: (しょうしせんばん) - (yoji) highly ridiculous; quite absurd
笑殺: (しょうさつ) - laughing off; dismissing with a laugh
笑気: (しょうき) - nitrous oxide (N2O); laughing gas
